_header: I loved a child of this country
Subjects: carols, amorous; laments; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: A Forsaken Maiden’s Lament — three quatrains with ‘For he is far’ refrain and burden: ‘Were it vndo that is ydo / I wold be war’

CamGon383.First Lines:
y louede a child of þis cuntre& so y wende he had do
                    me…
CamGon383.Last Lines: …now y sykke & m[ ]ne stillefor he is fare
